title: GET_SELECTED_PED_WEAPON
content:
0xD240123E// GetSelectedPedWeapon
Hash GET_SELECTED_PED_WEAPON(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target ped.Returns: The weapon hash.An alias of GET_CURRENT_PED_WEAPON.Note, the client-side GET_SELECTED_PED_WEAPON native returns the weapon selected via the HUD (weapon wheel). This data is not available to FXServer.
